alert.note: Alert for Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:35PM CDT until August 20 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL WOODFORD AND NORTHEASTERN TAZEWELL COUNTIES... At 235 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Washington, or 8 miles west of Eureka, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Metamora around 245 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Eureka, Goodfield, Roanoke and Secor. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
